question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Enum: IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Clone Safety] Are sensitive credentials in both GcsFileStore and LocalFileStore properly cleared from memory when IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig instances are dropped? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Enum: IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Serialization Leakage] Can Debug trait implementation on IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig leak sensitive GCS credentials or file paths in logs or error messages? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Impl: Default for IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Panic Vulnerability] Does current_dir().unwrap() cause a panic when current directory is inaccessible, potentially crashing the indexer and causing loss of liveness? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Impl: Default for IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Predictable Default] Can an attacker exploit the predictable default path (current directory) to inject malicious indexer files if the service is started from a world-writable directory? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Impl: Default for IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Environment Dependency] Does the default configuration depend on execution environment, causing inconsistent behavior across different deployment contexts (Docker, systemd, manual launch)? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Impl: Default for IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Race Condition] Can the current working directory be changed by another thread between current_dir() call and actual file store initialization, causing TOCTOU vulnerability? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Impl: Default for IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Security Misconfig] Does using LocalFileStore as default instead of requiring explicit configuration lead to insecure deployments where operators forget to configure proper GCS storage? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Impl: Default for IndexerGrpcFileStoreConfig] [Unhandled Error] Is the unwrap() call a potential panic point that could be triggered by attackers manipulating filesystem permissions to make current_dir() fail? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Credential Clone] Does cloning gcs_file_store_service_account_key_path in the GCS branch create additional copies of sensitive credential paths in memory that may not be securely cleared? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Async Race Condition] Can concurrent calls to create_filestore() cause race conditions in file store initialization, leading to multiple file stores accessing the same paths simultaneously? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Error Propagation] Does GcsFileStore::new() properly validate credentials and bucket access, or can initialization succeed with invalid credentials only to fail during actual operations? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Arc Leakage] Can Arc reference cycles prevent proper cleanup of file store resources, causing memory leaks that degrade validator performance over time? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Type Erasure Risk] Does returning Arc<dyn IFileStore> erase important type information that could be used for runtime security checks or access control? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Initialization Validation] Can create_filestore() return successfully even if the underlying file store is in an invalid state, allowing operations on uninitialized or corrupted file stores? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Await Safety] Are there any panic points in the .await operations that could crash the indexer if GCS initialization encounters network errors or timeouts? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Move Semantics] Does consuming self with create_filestore() prevent re-initialization with different configurations, or can the config be cloned to create multiple conflicting file stores? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create_filestore()] [Async Cancellation] If the async task running create_filestore() is cancelled, are resources properly cleaned up, or can partial initialization leave the file store in an inconsistent state? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Clone Overhead] Does cloning gcs_file_store_bucket_name, bucket_sub_dir, and service_account_key_path create unnecessary memory allocations that could be exploited for memory exhaustion? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Credential Duplication] Are service account key paths cloned multiple times in create(), leaving multiple copies of sensitive credential references in heap memory vulnerable to memory dumps? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Box Heap Allocation] Can the Box allocation for FileStoreOperator trait objects fail in low-memory conditions, causing indexer crashes without proper error handling? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Reference Borrowing] Does create() borrow self immutably, allowing multiple concurrent file store operators to be created with the same configuration, potentially causing file access conflicts? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Operator Compatibility] Can different FileStoreOperator implementations (GcsFileStoreOperator vs LocalFileStoreOperator) interoperate safely, or can mixing them cause data corruption? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Compression Flag Propagation] Is the enable_compression flag properly validated and propagated to the file store operators, or can mismatches cause decompression failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Panic Safety] Can any of the ::new() constructor calls in create() panic, leaving the indexer in an unrecoverable state without proper error handling? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/config.rs] [Function: create()] [Type Safety] Does the Box<dyn FileStoreOperator> type erasure hide important security-relevant type information about whether GCS or local file store is in use? (Low)
